name: The Fickle Hands of Fate
description:
The Fickle Hands of Fate is a short point and click adventure game

Fate is finalizing her last recording in the steeple of an abandoned church in a village she is about to leave. Then, off to another city and another recording: her search is not over yet.

Development

This very short game was developed for the Monthly Adventure Game Studio (MAGS) competition in May 2017.

It can also be considered a small experiment about how would a single-click interface work on point and click adventure games without compromising storytelling.
